A justification of set forms of prayer and in special of the liturgy of the Church of England; in answer to, and confutation of Vavasor Powel's Fourteen considerations, against all composed and imposed forms of prayer. By Richard Lewthwat, M.A. and rector of Wethersdale in Suffolk. Lewthwat, Richard.
[38], 85, [1] p.
printed by A. Godbid and J. Playford, for Robert Clavel, at the Peacock in St. Pauls Church-Yard, London : 1679.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
=======
